Name: Cardsweeper
About the game: You like Minesweeper and Sudoku, but can you imagine the birth child of these two? Do you get excited whenever you see number? Do you want to enhance your reaction speed to numbers? Do you enjoy using brains? If you answer “yes” to any of the questions above, then you definitely can’t miss our newest puzzle game - “Cardsweeper”! This is an innovative puzzle game based on numbers, and we carefully design 66 beautiful puzzles, which await your challenge! Whenever we mention “innovative”, we mean business. And therefore, you really think we only bring one innovative gameplay mechanics? No, we bring three! 1. Pairing 2. Sum 3. Solitaire
